short_summary: The Parks Canada Agency is seeking quotations for a Front End Loader for the Jasper National Park, Alberta, Canada.
description: This is an open solicitión for quotations. The requested delivery date for the goods is October 31, 2023.
tags: Avis de toujours ouvertyses a regarder scraped datapoints and added the province of ## below:
full_summary:
# Front End Loader Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** `cb-6977-8016346`
**Publication Date:** `2023-07-05`
**Tender Closing Date:** `2023-07-19T16:00:00` (Cancelled)

The Parks Canada Agency is seeking a supplier to provide a Front End Loader suitable for operation in the Jasper National Park in Alberta. The requested delivery date for the goods is October 31, 2023.

**Eligibility**
Only suppliers holding a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) E60HS-18LOAD/A are eligible to participate in this bid solicitation. Suppliers wishing to pre-qualify under this RFSA should refer to the following website: `https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-644-75242`.

**Tender Details**
- **Category:** Goods and Services (`GD`)
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (`Demande de propositions`)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive-Selective Tendering (`Procédure de sélection concurrentielle`)

**Evaluation Criteria**
The lowest bid will be the basis for the selection of the successful supplier.

**Notice Features**
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (`Accord de libre-échange canadien`), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (`Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie`), and others.
- **Geographic Region:** Alberta (`Alberta`)
- **Language of Procurement:** English (`Anglais`) and French (`Français`)
- **Contact Information:**
  - Terry Imm (`Terry Imm`)
  - Phone: `(250) 837-1659`
  - Email: `terry.imm@pc.gc.ca`
  - Fax: `(866) 246-6893`
  - Address: 220 - 4 Avenue S.E., suite 720, Calgary, Alberta, T2G 4X3, Canada.

Please note that this particular tender is no longer accepting submissions, as it has been cancelled. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to the contact person above. For other procurement opportunities, kindly refer to the official website of the Government of Canada. [1](https://www.canad.ca/fr/services/acquisition/procurement.html) [2](https://www.tpsgc.pwgsc.gc.ca
